task.title: How to Prepare the Freezer Bowl
task.shortdesc: The freezer bowl must be frozen before use in order for a frozen dessert to be made successfully.

step.cmd: Place the dry, clean freezer bowl into the back of the freezer for at least 12 hours.
Shake the frozen freezer bowl. If you hear liquid sloshing, put the freezer bowl back into the freezer until the liquid is frozen.
